## ‚ùì Support / Incidents Pull Request

### Related Issue
- Please link the issue(s) this PR addresses:
  Closes #<issue_number>

### Description
- Summarize the problem or request.
- Explain what changes this PR introduces to resolve it.
- Include any context helpful for reviewers.

### Implementation Details
- Describe steps taken to investigate or resolve the issue.
- Include any configuration, dependencies, or environment details.
- Reference any temporary fixes or workarounds.

### Testing
- [ ] Manual verification performed
- [ ] Issue replication verified
- [ ] All affected components are checked

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated if behavior changed
- [ ] Examples or screenshots are added (if applicable)

### Checklist
- [ ] Linked related issue(s)
- [ ] Issue clearly described
- [ ] Fix or update verified
- [ ] PR is ready for review by the team

### Risks / Impact
- Minor service disruption is possible during testing
- Any areas that require special attention by support/QA

### Notes
- Additional information, screenshots, logs, or instructions for QA.
